verses.verse: Now it came to pass upon a <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the young <S%H5288>man<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> his <S%H3627>armour<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us go <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>' <S%H4673>garrison<s%>, that is on the other <S%H5676>side<s%>. But he <S%H5046>told<s%> not his <S%H1>father<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in the <S%H7097>outermost<s%> part of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> under a pomegranate <S%H7416>tree<s%> which is in <S%H4051>Migron<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him were about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>;

And <S%H281>Ahiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>, <S%H350>I<s%>–chabod's <S%H251>brother<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H3548>priest<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, <S%H5375>wearing<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%>. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H1980>gone<s%>.

And between the <S%H4569>passages<s%>, by which <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to go <S%H5674>over<s%> unto the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>' <S%H4673>garrison<s%>, there was a <S%H8127>sharp<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%> on the one <S%H5676>side<s%>, and a <S%H8127>sharp<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%>: and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H949>Bozez<s%>, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5573>Seneh<s%>.

The <S%H8127>forefront<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H4690>situated<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H4363>Michmash<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1387>Gibeah<s%>.

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the young <S%H5288>man<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> his <S%H3627>armour<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us go <S%H5674>over<s%> unto the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of these <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>: it may be that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6213>work<s%> for <S%H4622>us<s%>: for there is no restraint to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> by <S%H7227>many<s%> or by <S%H4592>few<s%>.
And his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>him<s%>, Do all that is in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>: <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H3824>you<s%>; behold, I am with you according to your heart.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, <S%H5674>Behold<s%>, we will pass over unto these <S%H582>men<s%>, and we will discover ourselves unto <S%H1540>them<s%>.
If they <S%H559>say<s%> thus unto <S%H1826>us<s%>, Stay until we <S%H5060>come<s%> to <S%H5975>you<s%>; then we will stand still in our <S%H5927>place<s%>, and will not go up unto them.

But if they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H5927>thus<s%>, Come up unto <S%H5927>us<s%>; then we will go up: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into our <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and this shall be a sign unto <S%H226>us<s%>.

And <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H1540>discovered<s%> themselves unto the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5680>Behold<s%>, the Hebrews come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H2356>holes<s%> where they had hid <S%H2244>themselves<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4675>garrison<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3045>us<s%>, and we will show you a <S%H1697>thing<s%>. And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%>, Come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>: for the Lord has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> climbed <S%H5927>up<s%> upon his <S%H3027>hands<s%> and upon his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5307>him<s%>: and they fell <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>; and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H4191>killed<s%> after <S%H310>him<s%>.

And that <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>, which <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H5221>made<s%>, was about <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>, inside as it were an <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4618>acre<s%> of <S%H7704>land<s%>, which a yoke of oxen might <S%H6776>plow<s%>.

And there was <S%H2731>trembling<s%> in the <S%H4264>army<s%>, in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and among all the <S%H5971>people<s%>: the <S%H4673>garrison<s%>, and the <S%H7843>spoilers<s%>, they also <S%H2729>trembled<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>quaked<s%>: so it was a very <S%H430>great<s%> <S%H2731>trembling<s%>.

And the <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%>; <S%H1995>and<s%>, behold, the multitude melted <S%H4127>away<s%>, and they <S%H3212>went<s%> on beating down one <S%H1986>another<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with <S%H6485>him<s%>, Number <S%H7200>now<s%>, and see who is <S%H1980>gone<s%> from <S%H6485>us<s%>. And when they had numbered, <S%H3129>behold<s%>, Jonathan and his armor bearer were not <S%H5375>there<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H281>Ahiah<s%>, Bring <S%H5066>here<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>. For the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was at that <S%H3117>time<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it came to <S%H7586>pass<s%>, while Saul <S%H1696>talked<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, that the <S%H1995>noise<s%> that was in the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H1980>on<s%> and <S%H7227>increased<s%>: and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, <S%H622>Withdraw<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him <S%H2199>assembled<s%> <S%H935>themselves<s%>, and they came to the <S%H4421>battle<s%>: <S%H376>and<s%>, behold, every man's <S%H2719>sword<s%> was against his <S%H7453>fellow<s%>, and there was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>confusion<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> that were with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H865>before<s%> that <S%H8032>time<s%>, which went <S%H5927>up<s%> with them into the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from the country round <S%H5439>about<s%>, even they also turned to be with the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> that were with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>.

Likewise all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which had <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>, even they also followed <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>: and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> unto <S%H1007>Beth<s%>–aven.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H5065>distressed<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>: for <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H422>adjured<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H3899>food<s%> until <S%H6153>evening<s%>, that I may be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on my <S%H341>enemies<s%>. So none of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2938>tasted<s%> any <S%H3899>food<s%>.
And all they of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to a <S%H3293>wood<s%>; and there was <S%H1706>honey<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H7704>ground<s%>.

And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H3293>wood<s%>, <S%H1706>behold<s%>, the honey <S%H1982>dropped<s%>; but no man <S%H5381>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%>.

But <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> not when his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7650>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with the <S%H7650>oath<s%>: why he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4294>rod<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> it in an <S%H3295>honeycomb<s%>, and <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H215>enlightened<s%>.

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7650>directly<s%> <S%H7650>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with an <S%H7650>oath<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H3899>food<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5774>faint<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>, My <S%H1>father<s%> has <S%H5916>troubled<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>: <S%H7200>see<s%>, I pray <S%H5869>you<s%>, how my eyes have been <S%H215>enlightened<s%>, because I <S%H2938>tasted<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> of this <S%H1706>honey<s%>.

How much <S%H637>more<s%>, if <S%H3863>haply<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H398>freely<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7998>plunder<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> which they <S%H4672>found<s%>? for had there not been now a much <S%H7235>greater<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> among the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>?

And they <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> to <S%H357>Aijalon<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H5774>faint<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5860>flew<s%> upon the <S%H7998>plunder<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H1121>calves<s%>, and <S%H7819>killed<s%> them on the <S%H776>ground<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> them with the <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

Then they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H5971>Behold<s%>, the people <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, in that they <S%H398>eat<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, You have <S%H898>transgressed<s%>: <S%H1556>roll<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> unto me this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6327>Disperse<s%> yourselves among the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H5066>them<s%>, Bring me here every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> them <S%H398>here<s%>, and eat; and <S%H2398>sin<s%> not against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H398>eating<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5066>brought<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%> with <S%H3027>him<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%>, and killed them <S%H7819>there<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: the same was the <S%H2490>first<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> that he <S%H1129>built<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H962>plunder<s%> them until the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>, and let us not <S%H7604>leave<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H559>them<s%>. And they said, <S%H6213>Do<s%> whatever <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> unto <S%H559>you<s%>. Then said the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, Let us draw <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> counsel of <S%H430>God<s%>, Shall I go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? will you <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? But he <S%H6030>answered<s%> him not that <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Draw you <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%>, all the <S%H6438>chief<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>where<s%> this <S%H2403>sin<s%> has been this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

<S%H3068>For<s%>, as the Lord <S%H2416>lives<s%>, which <S%H3467>saves<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, though it <S%H3426>be<s%> in <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>. But there was not a man among all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that answered <S%H6030>him<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Be you on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%>, and I and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> will be on the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%>. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H6213>Do<s%> what <S%H5869>seems<s%> good unto <S%H2896>you<s%>.

Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3051>Give<s%> a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H7586>lot<s%>. And Saul and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> were <S%H3920>taken<s%>: but the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>escaped<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5307>Cast<s%> lots between me and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>. And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>.

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me what you have <S%H6213>done<s%>. And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, I did <S%H2938>but<s%> <S%H2938>taste<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> with the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4294>rod<s%> that was in my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, <S%H2009>and<s%>, behold, I must <S%H4191>die<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> do <S%H6213>so<s%> and more <S%H3254>also<s%>: for you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, Shall <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, who has <S%H6213>worked<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? God <S%H2486>forbid<s%>: as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>, there shall not one <S%H8185>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>; for he has <S%H6213>worked<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>. So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6299>rescued<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>, that he died <S%H4191>not<s%>.
Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to their own <S%H4725>place<s%>.

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against all his <S%H341>enemies<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, against <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and against the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and against <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and against the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%>, and against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: and wherever he <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H7561>himself<s%>, he troubled them.

And he <S%H6213>gathered<s%> an <S%H2428>army<s%>, and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%>, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of them that spoiled <S%H8154>them<s%>.
